thread.title: Jeremy Kyle Show guest accuses boyfriend of cheating due to missing golden condom and 'smell of sex'
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle Show guest accuses boyfriend of cheating due to missing golden condom and 'smell of sex'

author: Hayley Minn
title: Jeremy Kyle Show guest accuses boyfriend of cheating due to missing golden condom and 'smell of sex'
text:
TV Jeremy Kyle Show guest accuses boyfriend of cheating due to missing golden condom and 'smell of sex' Sarah was sure Jeremy had done the dirty on her - but he insisted it was just a 'posh w**k' Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now "Room smelled of sex and golden condom went missing" Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
A Jeremy Kyle Show guest came on to the show today to accuse her partner of cheating. 
But viewers of the ITV show were confused when Sarah said the reason was because a golden condom went missing and there was “the smell of sex in the room”. 
She said: “I’m a very clean person and there was a sexual smell in the air.” 
But her partner Jeremy insisted he was drunk and had used the golden condom for a “posh w**k”. 
But she wasn’t convinced and demanded a lie detector. Read More The Jeremy Kyle guest said her boyfriend had cheated on her (Photo: ITV) She put it down to a missing golden condom (Photo: ITV) He claimed it was just a "posh w**k" (Photo: ITV) 
Jeremy Kyle viewers were confused at what smell sex has, with one asking: "Maybe I'm doing it wrong, but sex doesn't smell does it? Then again, we tend to wash our bits regularly…” 
Another added: “What does sex smell of? #jeremykyle.” 
Viewers were none the wiser following the sex smell revelation, but in the end, the lie detector results revealed he hadn’t cheated on her. Read More He passed the lie detector test (Photo: ITV) He hadn't cheated (Photo: ITV) 
And Jeremy told her: “Babe’s he’s alright. He’s done nothing in 14 years. 
“Get married, have fun and be happy!” 
Sarah and Darren have remained in a relationship since the show and are currently in the process of planning their wedding. 
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am Like us on Facebook
